short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds any mention of the original Cipher_Peon on a website and inserts a quote from @ThingsCipherSez

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
―
⚠ Google Chrome may tell you to remove this and other “Manifest V2” extensions as part of their attempt to force adoption of “Manifest V3”.  This extension remains fully supported, but will remain on MV2 as long as possible to retain support for older Chromebooks and oppose other issues with MV3 highlighted by the EFF – https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2021/12/googles-manifest-v3-still-hurts-privacy-security-innovation.
―

This extension finds any mention of the person who formerly went by @Cipher_Peon on any website and inserts a quote from @ThingsCipherSez.

This extension needs page access to insert the quotes; it does not collect any data.  If you have privacy concerns, the source code is available at https://github.com/ZMYaro/cipher-web.
